Z13237.description: Perhaps luck was on her side and she repelled the enemy. Stars gleamed in the sky just as they did years ago.

Z13241.name: Vague Light - Sky
Z13241.description: The light of hope never died. Angie seemed to hear the girl telling her that she would protect this city.

Z13265.name: Dazzling Figure
Z13265.description: The 12-year-old Viola crawled out of the box with biscuit crumbs on her dress. She was playing a dragon slayer.

Z13298.name: Starlit Festival
Z13298.description: The cat watched them from the shadows. The priestess raised the golden scepter and announced her approval.

Z13309.name: Star Praise
Z13309.description: She thought this name was appropriate, because the history was comprised of the rises and falls of civilizations.

Z13375.name: Light of Fate
Z13375.description: She was frozen for a moment but soon realized Charlotte was giving her a chance. So she asked for an audition.

Z13417.name: Leaves Turn to Dust
Z13417.description: As the snow envelops the world, the elderly return to the earth, and new life emerges. The cycle is perpetual.

Z13433.name: Stellar Gleam
Z13433.description: She immediately agrees and drives her car to the newly built mall to choose a location for her store.

Z13440.name: Entwined Fate
Z13440.description: Nydia has heard a lot about the craftswoman Tara and the trendsetter Mig, who'll be running stores next to hers.

Z13456.name: Dreamless Flower
Z13456.description: The unexpected visitor dropped by again. Joyce reached out her hands, and the bird tilted its head and looked at her.

Z13577.name: Upscale Taste
Z13577.description: Giovanna never cared about big brands. Instead, she loved to discover young designers and their works.

Z13587.name: Bloodstain
Z13587.description: She buried her lover's body in the garden, where roses would grow and the red petals would look like her blood.

Z13624.name: Distant Song
Z13624.description: When the war was over, the soldiers returned and were surprised to find that the forest had become a bare mountain.

Z13635.name: Child's Dream
Z13635.description: The dresses were of course beautiful, but the girl only wanted to make dolls because that was her childhood dream.

Z13668.name: Sincere Pledge
Z13668.description: 'I shall venture into the woods and challenge the dragon!' Reshia promised as she blew out her birthday candles.

Z13674.name: Sincere Pledge · Blue
Z13674.description: 'Are you Rianne's friend?' the young man asked with hope in his eyes, 'She came here a long time ago.'

Z13711.name: Fallen Pearl
Z13711.description: When thunder struck, spirits all hid behind rocks, but she rushed up the mountain to be with her mentor.

Z13772.name: Guileless Wish
Z13772.description: 'A wish to keep the house always clean,' while the stars make this simple wish, Becky is already on her way.

Z13796.name: Dubious Oath
Z13796.description: Vena only stared in silence as usual. She always appeared obedient to her father's and brothers' orders.

Z13848.name: Eternal Memory
Z13848.description: The sorcerer controls Liz to weave toxic webs to hunt the prey. What should Vanis do to save her?

Z13873.name: Vernal Meadow
Z13873.description: Everyone's mouth was dyed black, revealing black teeth and tongue. 'Hahaha!' Alouette burst out laughing.

Z13930.name: Dewy Breeze
Z13930.description: But Gardenia's prophecy said that Aram would resurface thousands of years later and all its people would be reunited.

Z13937.name: Seashell's Murmur
Z13937.description: 'Oh the lively fish and beautiful shells; oh, everything so wonderful there.' The sailors' song represents their hope.

Z13976.name: Cirrus Wreath
Z13976.description: It barely left a ripple in her life. She still sat by the sea and gazed up to capture more beautiful clouds.

Z13978.name: Cirrus Wreath - Purple
Z13978.description: The girl never thought of selling her paintings and only wished to show these tranquil views to everyone.

Z13980.name: Cirrus Wreath - Blue
Z13980.description: The girl didn't accept any reward. All she wanted was for more people to appreciate the beauty of the peaceful sky.

Z14063.name: Sunlit Seasons
Z14063.description: The introverted girl grew into a self-assured lady. She would forever treasure the experiences along the journey.

Z14172.name: Stellar Fields
Z14172.description: The innkeeper probes, 'Are you from the Zephyr Hall?' Qiguan Yu only hands over the books, 'No mistakes, well done.'

Z14184.name: Tinkling Bracelet
Z14184.description: With solid evidence in hand, the slander against Qiguan Jin and the Zephyr Hall will come to an end tomorrow.

Z14243.name: Lilting Chant
Z14243.description: Felicia remembered how she made a wish on her birthday this year that she would become a great actress on stage.

Z14284.name: Eureka Fountain
Z14284.description: With the witch's potion, Tritty turns into a pretty girl, but whatever she does, she can't hide her beautiful tail.

Z14303.name: Sunlight Streak
Z14303.description: She lies on the grass and basks in the warmth of the sun, as butterflies whisper secrets to her ears.

Z14355.name: Magical Journey
Z14355.description: Mr. Spring and I promised a reunion each year, a promise that we have always kept no matter how far we were.'

Z14404.name: Fortune's Signs
Z14404.description: The diligent queen and her sister would sometimes lie in each other's embrace as they gazed into the stars.

Z14407.name: Blooming Patience
Z14407.description: Mina always paused to listen to these stories, her flowers standing as a silent witness to sincerity and affection.

Z14410.name: Blooming Patience - Indigo
Z14410.description: The girl spoke feebly to Mina, hoping to once again feel the touch of the yellow flower she first received from Mina.

Z14413.name: Blooming Patience - Warmth
Z14413.description: Euphoria washed over Mina as the yellow petals broke through the bud. She placed the flower in her embrace and ran.

Z14433.name: Aureate Touch
Z14433.description: Standing at the mist-enveloped entrance, Elina stopped to ask a wandering goose for directions.

Z14490.name: Eternal Prosperity
Z14490.description: Kiri is also a famous cook in the town: the unique flavor of her rice cakes and cookies is her trademark.

Z14520.name: Radiant Extravagance
Z14520.description: She suddenly felt a rush of air brushing past her as she closed her eyes to the nauseating sensation.

Z14528.name: Effulgent Year
Z14528.description: Cosette's affluent friends came to congratulate her, each a testament and success story in their pursuit of dreams.

Z14594.name: Spring Breeze
Z14594.description: Abby squeezed into the tree house as wind flipped through the pages of slightly yellow pages of a poetry book.

Z14645.name: Fragrant Dream
Z14645.description: Cloudria had cuts on her fingertips but still insisted on gathering lotus seedpods from the lake.

Z14675.name: Breezy Garland
Z14675.description: Shadie held the camera to photograph the bees. 'Look, a honey factory!' she noticed an amber-colored building.

Z14722.name: Everlasting Ardor
Z14722.description: One day a senior came from afar and put a red rose into the dancer's palm. 'May your wish come true.'

Z14728.name: Crunchy Magic
Z14728.description: People asked the staff member how to make the magical popcorn and only got the answer that it was a secret.

Z14779.name: Drizzle Ripple
Z14779.description: The tree that they planted together waves its leaves to greet them. It wouldn't grow up without the sun or the rain.

Z14788.name: Intertwining Vines
Z14788.description: Thick vines blocked her way. Suddenly, a loud boom came from somewhere, startling her like thunder.

Z14811.name: Stellar Duet
Z14811.description: The dance with a puppet became a special staple of the December Troupe, inspiring those in the face of adversity.

Z14848.name: Spring Sweetness
Z14848.description: In the shade of a tree, she took a bite of the flower cake, feeling the sweetness of spring between her teeth.

Z14858.name: Tender Cuddle
Z14858.description: O Jolly Times was sung softly in the storm, and each note in the cheerful tune felt full of power.

Z14881.name: Loyal Reader
Z14881.description: Prairie's grandma was still her most loyal reader, but now she needed glasses to read slowly between naps.

Z14891.name: Forest Blessing
Z14891.description: A quiet voice sounded when Purin was about to give up. It turned out the deer snuck out of its home and got lost.

Z14913.name: Melting Snow
Z14913.description: She'd sometimes recall that dance when she sat under twinkling stars, fantasizing about a more magical time.

Z14970.name: Pinecone Harvest
Z14970.description: The gods not only have infinite power, but they represent wisdom and justice, guiding all that is lost.

Z15013.name: Brave the Storm
Z15013.description: Tourism brought wealth to the remote kingdom, but also envy of a neighboring state. They sent an army to attack.

Z15016.name: Spell of Frost
Z15016.description: The princess gladly agreed. She was no longer chained by fate and fear. The world awaited her exploration.

Z15050.name: Cerulean Dream
Z15050.description: Henutawi played both sides: she contacted her loyal followers, while her fortune attracted those greedy for more.

Z15085.name: Pure White Spindrift
Z15085.description: There were bubbling volcanos and secret caves in the depth. For the first time, Besha learned the wonders of the sea.

Z15096.name: Aureate Sparkle
Z15096.description: Arina saw the ocean in her mind clearly as Besha described it—fish swam by in schools, glistening like floating gems.

Z15108.name: Creamy Sweetness
Z15108.description: Vivienne blew the seashell as dolphins elegantly leapt above the water, leaving a fantastic curve in the air.

Z15117.name: Evanescent Bloom
Z15117.description: The flowers bloomed and adorned the season. Even if one day they wilted, their brilliance would always be remembered.

Z15367.name: Sonorous Affection
Z15367.description: As the song turned to a gentle lilt, Jafar was surprised to recognize it as the very tune her mother used to hum.

Z15408.name: Pellucid Strings
Z15408.description: The audience was enraptured by the tune Ayesha played. Jafar came up and asked Ayesha where she learned the song.

Z15497.name: Pristine Vow
Z15497.description: They walk together through icy lakes, deserted valleys, and snow-covered plains, but find nothing.

Z15564.name: Silken Lullaby
Z15564.description: Hayden wrote fairytales for the children of Lilith. Ophelia wanted the same, telling stories with songs of bubbles.

Z15583.name: Precious Sparkle
Z15583.description: Whenever new land is to be cultivated, the girl is always at the forefront and faces every challenge head-on.

Z15601.name: Nostalgic Vision
Z15601.description: Not sure where to begin, Prince Yong received evidence from Shuji proving the governor's corruption.

Z15674.name: Midnight Bloom
Z15674.description: The kids gathered in a lane, still mesmerized by the blooms. 'What's this?' Someone takes a bud off a girl's hair.

Z15723.name: Emerald Shadow
Z15723.description: The poet takes a sip of wine and savors the sweet aftertaste. She decides to praise it in her new song.

Z16017.name: Moonlit Gaze
Z16017.description: The messenger brought a pile of packages, from a portal speaker, CDs, sweets from her hometown to starry ribbons.
